overview.heading: A Rare Countryside Sanctuary
overview.leadText: Discover this exceptional T4 villa nestled in the prestigious Colinas Verdes development in Portugal's stunning Algarve region, offering the perfect blend of countryside tranquility and urban convenience, just 10 minutes from the historic center of Lagos.
overview.paragraph1: This distinguished property spans over 2,000 square meters of mature landscaped gardens, featuring a south-facing swimming pool, multiple secluded terraces, and a charming fish pond connected by winding pathways. The villa exemplifies refined Portuguese living with its spacious interiors, characterized by beamed ceilings, premium finishes, and an abundance of natural light.
overview.paragraph2: Beyond its architectural elegance, this home offers exceptional lifestyle amenities including a private sauna, dedicated gym cabin, and a converted office space with mezzanine—ideal for modern remote working. Energy-efficient solar panels and a B energy rating underscore the property's commitment to sustainable luxury.

location.description: Lagos is one of Portugal's Algarve region's most historic and charming cities, renowned for its stunning beaches, vibrant marina, excellent restaurants, and rich cultural heritage. The Colinas Verdes area provides a peaceful retreat while maintaining convenient access to all that this beautiful part of Portugal has to offer.
